sentences.english: A:I am at the Ambassador Hotel right now.
sentences.chinese: 我現在住在國賓大飯店。

sentences.english: Our company is in a building near the Ambassador Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 本公司在國賓飯店附近的一棟大樓裏。

sentences.english: The distinction of "vehicles for state guests" brought good luck to Golden Dragon Coasters .
sentences.chinese: 國賓車“的政治殊榮給金旅考斯特帶來了好運。

sentences.english: Will you show me the way to the Ambassador Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 請你告訴我去國賓飯店的路好嗎？

sentences.english: He was invited to paint at Diaoyutai State Guesthouse.
sentences.chinese: 應邀去釣魚臺國賓館作畫。

sentences.english: The Presidential Hotel Beijing represents a new breed of five star business hotel in the fast developing westside of Beijing and belongs to CIIC Group.
sentences.chinese: 北京國賓酒店是中實集團下屬的涉外五星級旗艦酒店。

sentences.english: Do you know the Ambassador Hotel in Taipei?
sentences.chinese: 您知道臺北的國賓飯店嗎？

sentences.english: This article recalled the history and development of Architecture Department at University of Pennsylvania since one hundred yeas ago.
sentences.chinese: 該文追溯了美國賓夕法尼亞大學建築系百年來的發展。

sentences.english: The Ambassador Hotel is a Los Angeles landmark.
sentences.chinese: 國賓大飯店是洛杉磯的地標性建築之一。

sentences.english: The fragrance of State Guest Da Hung Pao tea is said to be so long-lasting.
sentences.chinese: 國賓大紅袍的茶香據說是非常持久。

sentences.english: RFK was gunned down in the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel just minutes later.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪在進入國賓大飯店的廚房幾分鐘後就被槍殺了。

sentences.english: Diaoyutai state guesthouse heavily, make many people feel guards mystery?
sentences.chinese: 釣魚臺國賓館森嚴的警衛，令幾人倍感神祕？

sentences.english: Guests visiting the United States, held in the south lawn of the official welcoming ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 國賓來訪美國時，都在南草坪舉行正式歡迎儀式。
